Claim: "The Earth has experienced five mass extinctions."
Implication: "Many climate scientists believe the current ecological future is similar to the past mass extinctions."
Referring expressions: Earth, mass extinctions  Many climate scientists, current ecological future, mass extinctions
Formula: (exists a (HasExperienced(a)) & (forall g (forall f (forall e ( HasExperienced(e) ->   IsSimilarTo(f,g)))))) -> (exists d (exists c (exists a (Believe(c) and IsSimilarTo(d, a)))))
